projects.title: Project Fetch
projects.description: Project Fetch is a game developed by a three person team. The story follows a delivery dog on his journey across an animal world. Read more below! Art by Rachel Chen.

image.alt: Image of a mail-man dog standing in a forest

projects.title: Add more sections!
projects.description: The starter includes predefined sections as well as a template for new, custom sections. Moreover, you can add new projects to this section without additional coding. Photo by Kelly Sikkema on Unsplash.
